sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../styles/tour-details.css' import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup } from 'reactstrap' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating' import avatar from "../assets/images/avatar.jpg.jpg" const ToursDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams(); const tour = tourData.find(tour=> tour.id === id); const {photo, title, desc, price,address, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize} = tour; const {totalRating,avgRating}= calculateAvgRating(reviews); const options ={day:'numeric', month:'long', year:'numeric'}; return ( <>

{title}

{calculateAvgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating } { totalRating === 0 ? ( 'Not rated' ) : ( ({reviews?.length}) )} {address}
{city} ${price}/per person {maxGroupSize}
Description
{desc}

Reviews({reviews?.length} reviews)

1 2 3 4 5
{ reviews?.map(review=>(
shahrukh iqbal

{new Date('1-18-2023').toLocaleDateString('en-US',options)}

)) }
) } export default ToursDetails
